import { useState } from "react" import {v4 as uuid} from "uuid" export const AddressModal=({setAddressData,isEdit,updateAddress,setUpdateAddres,updatedAddres})=>{ const [addressInputs,setAddressInputs]=useState({}) const addAddress=()=>{ const address={ _id:uuid(), // addressInputs.fullName fullName:fullName, // phoneNumber, // city, // landMark,street } saveAddress(address) } const inputChangeHandler=(e)=>{ const name=e.target.name; const value=e.target.value; setAddressInputs((values)=>({...values,[name]:value})) } return <>
{/*

ADD a New ADDRESS

*/}
}
